mapper.select: SELECT DATA_1.HOUR , SUM(GIMPO_IN_RUSH_HOUR) AS GIMPO_IN_24 , SUM(GOCHON_RUSH_HOUR) AS GOCHON24 , SUM(PUNGMU_RUSH_HOUR) AS PUNGMU24 FROM (SELECT '00' AS HOUR, 0 AS GIMPO_IN_RUSH_HOUR, 0 AS GOCHON_RUSH_HOUR, 0 AS PUNGMU_RUSH_HOUR UNION ALL SELECT '01', 0, 0, 0 UNION ALL SELECT '02', 0, 0, 0 UNION ALL SELECT '03', 0, 0, 0 UNION ALL SELECT '04', 0, 0, 0 UNION ALL SELECT '05', 0, 0, 0 UNION ALL SELECT '06', 0, 0, 0 UNION ALL SELECT '07', 0, 0, 0 UNION ALL SELECT '08', 0, 0, 0 UNION ALL SELECT '09', 0, 0, 0 UNION ALL SELECT '10', 0, 0, 0 UNION ALL SELECT '11', 0, 0, 0 UNION ALL SELECT '12', 0, 0, 0 UNION ALL SELECT '13', 0, 0, 0 UNION ALL SELECT '14', 0, 0, 0 UNION ALL SELECT '15', 0, 0, 0 UNION ALL SELECT '16', 0, 0, 0 UNION ALL SELECT '17', 0, 0, 0 UNION ALL SELECT '18', 0, 0, 0 UNION ALL SELECT '19', 0, 0, 0 UNION ALL SELECT '20', 0, 0, 0 UNION ALL SELECT '21', 0, 0, 0 UNION ALL SELECT '22', 0, 0, 0 UNION ALL SELECT '23', 0, 0, 0 UNION ALL SELECT LAST.HOUR , SUM(LAST.GIMPO_IN_RUSH_HOUR) AS GIMPO_IN_RUSH_HOUR , SUM(LAST.GOCHON_RUSH_HOUR) AS GOCHON_RUSH_HOUR , SUM(LAST.PUNGMU_RUSH_HOUR) AS PUNGMU_RUSH_HOUR FROM ( SELECT STAT.hour AS HOUR , CASE WHEN STAT.event_status = '1' AND STAT.role_name IN ('김포-EC-출근', '김포-ST-출근', '김포-EV-출근') THEN SUM(STAT.data_cnt) END AS GIMPO_IN_RUSH_HOUR , CASE WHEN STAT.event_status = '1' AND STAT.role_name IN ('고촌-플랫폼1-출근', '고촌-플랫폼2-출근', '고촌-플랫폼3-출근', '고촌-플랫폼4-출근') THEN SUM(STAT.data_cnt) END AS GOCHON_RUSH_HOUR , CASE WHEN STAT.event_status = '1' AND STAT.role_name IN ('풍무-플랫폼1-출근', '풍무-플랫폼2-출근', '풍무-플랫폼3-출근', '풍무-플랫폼4-출근') THEN SUM(STAT.data_cnt) END AS PUNGMU_RUSH_HOUR FROM ( SELECT DATA.HOUR AS hour , R.role_name AS role_name , DATA.EVENT_STATUS AS event_status , DATA.DATA_CNT AS data_cnt FROM ( SELECT SUBSTRING(occu_time, 9, 2) AS HOUR , role_code AS ROLE_CODE , event_status AS EVENT_STATUS , SUM(event_cnt) AS DATA_CNT FROM TB_CROWD_DASHBOARD_SUMMARY H WHERE SUBSTRING(occu_time, 1, 8) = CONVERT(varchar, GETDATE(), 112) GROUP BY SUBSTRING(occu_time, 9, 2) , role_code , event_status ) DATA LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_EVENT_ROLE_DL R ON DATA.ROLE_CODE = r.role_code WHERE R.role_name IN ('김포-EC-출근', '김포-ST-출근', '김포-EV-출근', '고촌-플랫폼1-출근', '고촌-플랫폼2-출근', '고촌-플랫폼3-출근', '고촌-플랫폼4-출근', '풍무-플랫폼1-출근', '풍무-플랫폼2-출근', '풍무-플랫폼3-출근', '풍무-플랫폼4-출근') ) STAT GROUP BY STAT.hour , STAT.role_name , STAT.event_status ) LAST GROUP BY LAST.HOUR) DATA_1 GROUP BY DATA_1.HOUR

SELECT SUM(LAST.GIMPO_IN_24COUNT) AS GIMPO_IN_24COUNT , SUM(LAST.GIMPO_OUT_24COUNT) AS GIMPO_OUT_24COUNT , SUM(LAST.GOCHON24COUNT) AS GOCHON24COUNT , SUM(LAST.GOCHON1_24COUNT) AS GOCHON1_24COUNT , SUM(LAST.GOCHON2_24COUNT) AS GOCHON2_24COUNT , SUM(LAST.PUNGMU24COUNT) AS PUNGMU24COUNT FROM ( SELECT STAT.hour AS HOUR , CASE WHEN STAT.event_status = '1' AND STAT.role_name IN ('김포-EC-출근', '김포-ST-출근', '김포-EV-출근') THEN SUM(STAT.data_cnt) END AS GIMPO_IN_24COUNT , CASE WHEN STAT.event_status = '-1' AND STAT.role_name IN ('김포-EC-출근', '김포-ST-출근', '김포-EV-출근') THEN SUM(STAT.data_cnt) END AS GIMPO_OUT_24COUNT , CASE WHEN STAT.event_status = '1' AND STAT.role_name IN ('고촌-플랫폼1-출근', '고촌-플랫폼2-출근', '고촌-플랫폼3-출근', '고촌-플랫폼4-출근') THEN SUM(STAT.data_cnt) END AS GOCHON24COUNT , CASE WHEN STAT.event_status = '1' AND STAT.role_name IN ('고촌-역사입구1') THEN SUM(STAT.data_cnt) END AS GOCHON1_24COUNT , CASE WHEN STAT.event_status = '1' AND STAT.role_name IN ('고촌-역사입구2') THEN SUM(STAT.data_cnt) END AS GOCHON2_24COUNT , CASE WHEN STAT.event_status = '1' AND STAT.role_name IN ('풍무-플랫폼1-출근', '풍무-플랫폼2-출근', '풍무-플랫폼3-출근', '풍무-플랫폼4-출근') THEN SUM(STAT.data_cnt) END AS PUNGMU24COUNT FROM ( SELECT DATA.HOUR AS hour , R.role_name AS role_name , DATA.EVENT_STATUS AS event_status , DATA.DATA_CNT AS data_cnt FROM ( SELECT SUBSTRING(occu_time, 9, 2) AS HOUR , role_code AS ROLE_CODE , event_status AS EVENT_STATUS , SUM(event_cnt) AS DATA_CNT FROM TB_CROWD_DASHBOARD_SUMMARY H WHERE SUBSTRING(occu_time, 1, 8) = CONVERT(varchar, GETDATE(), 112) GROUP BY SUBSTRING(occu_time, 9, 2) , role_code , event_status ) DATA LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_EVENT_ROLE_DL R ON DATA.ROLE_CODE = r.role_code ) STAT GROUP BY STAT.hour , STAT.role_name , STAT.event_status ) LAST

SELECT DATA_1.HOUR , SUM(GIMPO_IN_RUSH_HOUR) AS GIMPO_IN_24CHANGE , SUM(GOCHON_RUSH_HOUR) AS GOCHON24CHANGE , SUM(PUNGMU_RUSH_HOUR) AS PUNGMU24CHANGE FROM (SELECT '00' AS HOUR, 0 AS GIMPO_IN_RUSH_HOUR, 0 AS GOCHON_RUSH_HOUR, 0 AS PUNGMU_RUSH_HOUR UNION ALL SELECT '01', 0, 0, 0 UNION ALL SELECT '02', 0, 0, 0 UNION ALL SELECT '03', 0, 0, 0 UNION ALL SELECT '04', 0, 0, 0 UNION ALL SELECT '05', 0, 0, 0 UNION ALL SELECT '06', 0, 0, 0 UNION ALL SELECT '07', 0, 0, 0 UNION ALL SELECT '08', 0, 0, 0 UNION ALL SELECT '09', 0, 0, 0 UNION ALL SELECT '10', 0, 0, 0 UNION ALL SELECT '11', 0, 0, 0 UNION ALL SELECT '12', 0, 0, 0 UNION ALL SELECT '13', 0, 0, 0 UNION ALL SELECT '14', 0, 0, 0 UNION ALL SELECT '15', 0, 0, 0 UNION ALL SELECT '16', 0, 0, 0 UNION ALL SELECT '17', 0, 0, 0 UNION ALL SELECT '18', 0, 0, 0 UNION ALL SELECT '19', 0, 0, 0 UNION ALL SELECT '20', 0, 0, 0 UNION ALL SELECT '21', 0, 0, 0 UNION ALL SELECT '22', 0, 0, 0 UNION ALL SELECT '23', 0, 0, 0 UNION ALL SELECT LAST.HOUR , SUM(LAST.GIMPO_IN_RUSH_HOUR) AS GIMPO_IN_RUSH_HOUR , SUM(LAST.GOCHON_RUSH_HOUR) AS GOCHON_RUSH_HOUR , SUM(LAST.PUNGMU_RUSH_HOUR) AS PUNGMU_RUSH_HOUR FROM ( SELECT STAT.hour AS HOUR , CASE WHEN STAT.event_status = '1' AND STAT.role_name IN ('김포-EC-출근', '김포-ST-출근', '김포-EV-출근') THEN SUM(STAT.data_cnt) END AS GIMPO_IN_RUSH_HOUR , CASE WHEN STAT.event_status = '1' AND STAT.role_name IN ('고촌-플랫폼1-출근', '고촌-플랫폼2-출근', '고촌-플랫폼3-출근', '고촌-플랫폼4-출근') THEN SUM(STAT.data_cnt) END AS GOCHON_RUSH_HOUR , CASE WHEN STAT.event_status = '1' AND STAT.role_name IN ('풍무-플랫폼1-출근', '풍무-플랫폼2-출근', '풍무-플랫폼3-출근', '풍무-플랫폼4-출근') THEN SUM(STAT.data_cnt) END AS PUNGMU_RUSH_HOUR FROM ( SELECT DATA.HOUR AS hour , R.role_name AS role_name , DATA.EVENT_STATUS AS event_status , DATA.DATA_CNT AS data_cnt FROM ( SELECT SUBSTRING(occu_time, 9, 2) AS HOUR , role_code AS ROLE_CODE , event_status AS EVENT_STATUS , SUM(event_cnt) AS DATA_CNT FROM TB_CROWD_DASHBOARD_SUMMARY H WHERE SUBSTRING(occu_time, 1, 8) = #{occuDate} GROUP BY SUBSTRING(occu_time, 9, 2) , role_code , event_status ) DATA LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_EVENT_ROLE_DL R ON DATA.ROLE_CODE = r.role_code WHERE R.role_name IN ('김포-EC-출근', '김포-ST-출근', '김포-EV-출근', '고촌-플랫폼1-출근', '고촌-플랫폼2-출근', '고촌-플랫폼3-출근', '고촌-플랫폼4-출근', '풍무-플랫폼1-출근', '풍무-플랫폼2-출근', '풍무-플랫폼3-출근', '풍무-플랫폼4-출근') ) STAT GROUP BY STAT.hour , STAT.role_name , STAT.event_status ) LAST GROUP BY LAST.HOUR) DATA_1 GROUP BY DATA_1.HOUR

SELECT SUM(LAST.GIMPO_IN_24COUNT) AS GIMPO_IN_24_CHANGE_COUNT , SUM(LAST.GIMPO_OUT_24COUNT) AS GIMPO_OUT_24_CHANGE_COUNT , SUM(LAST.GOCHON24COUNT) AS GOCHON24_CHANGE_COUNT , SUM(LAST.GOCHON1_24COUNT) AS GOCHON1_24_CHANGE_COUNT , SUM(LAST.GOCHON2_24COUNT) AS GOCHON2_24_CHANGE_COUNT , SUM(LAST.PUNGMU24COUNT) AS PUNGMU24_CHANGE_COUNT FROM ( SELECT STAT.hour AS HOUR , CASE WHEN STAT.event_status = '1' AND STAT.role_name IN ('김포-EC-출근', '김포-ST-출근', '김포-EV-출근') THEN SUM(STAT.data_cnt) END AS GIMPO_IN_24COUNT , CASE WHEN STAT.event_status = '-1' AND STAT.role_name IN ('김포-EC-출근', '김포-ST-출근', '김포-EV-출근') THEN SUM(STAT.data_cnt) END AS GIMPO_OUT_24COUNT , CASE WHEN STAT.event_status = '1' AND STAT.role_name IN ('고촌-플랫폼1-출근', '고촌-플랫폼2-출근', '고촌-플랫폼3-출근', '고촌-플랫폼4-출근') THEN SUM(STAT.data_cnt) END AS GOCHON24COUNT , CASE WHEN STAT.event_status = '1' AND STAT.role_name IN ('고촌-역사입구1') THEN SUM(STAT.data_cnt) END AS GOCHON1_24COUNT , CASE WHEN STAT.event_status = '1' AND STAT.role_name IN ('고촌-역사입구2') THEN SUM(STAT.data_cnt) END AS GOCHON2_24COUNT , CASE WHEN STAT.event_status = '1' AND STAT.role_name IN ('풍무-플랫폼1-출근', '풍무-플랫폼2-출근', '풍무-플랫폼3-출근', '풍무-플랫폼4-출근') THEN SUM(STAT.data_cnt) END AS PUNGMU24COUNT FROM ( SELECT DATA.HOUR AS hour , R.role_name AS role_name , DATA.EVENT_STATUS AS event_status , DATA.DATA_CNT AS data_cnt FROM ( SELECT SUBSTRING(occu_time, 9, 2) AS HOUR , role_code AS ROLE_CODE , event_status AS EVENT_STATUS , SUM(event_cnt) AS DATA_CNT FROM TB_CROWD_DASHBOARD_SUMMARY H WHERE SUBSTRING(occu_time, 1, 8) = #{occuDate} GROUP BY SUBSTRING(occu_time, 9, 2) , role_code , event_status ) DATA LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_EVENT_ROLE_DL R ON DATA.ROLE_CODE = r.role_code ) STAT GROUP BY STAT.hour , STAT.role_name , STAT.event_status ) LAST
